name: Go!Go!Fightmaster
description:
This is a small vertical slice (approximately 10 minutes long).

Go!Go!FightMaster is (or supposed to be) a comedic  visual novel with references to famous fighting game personalities and especially the competitive scene of Streetfighter 5. It is about a young woman, Canny, who learns the fighting game FightMaster Vll and her experiences with the tournament community.
